titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to grant to the widow or widower of a Federal employee or annuitant whose health insurance coverage would otherwise terminate because of such employee's or annuitant's death the right to elect the same temporary extension of coverage as is available to certain former spouses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Directs the Office of Personnel Management to include as individuals eligible to elect temporary continued health insurance coverage the widow or widower of a Federal employee or annuitant whose coverage would otherwise terminate because of the employee's or annuitant's death.
